short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your favourite online & highstreet superstores on one tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopping Essentials UK brings you your favourite online and high street superstores in the UK all in one tab! Get ready to shop, compare items between a variety of electronic, beauty, home, pet, fashions stores and more before you place your socially-distanced order from the comfort of your Chrome browser toolbar, without having to open multiple tabs or browsers. From Argos to Boots to ebay, access your favourite UK superstores in one tab with ease, while browsing the internet with a convenient search box powered by Bing.com

How to get started:
Shopping Essentials UK is a new tab extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to superstores in the UK in one place. Once it has been added to your browser from the Chrome Web Store, it will be displayed in your new tab from where you can use it. Once the extension is added, users will need to register or login into their respective superstore accounts per the Terms stated by the respective websites. The extension does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions. The search engine on the new tab will change to Bing.com once downloaded.

Features:
Safe and secure access to Boots, Argos, ebay and many more    
Custom web search bar powered by Bing.com    
Ease of navigation between superstore sites    
Completely free to use    

Permissions:
It needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Shopping Essentials UK extension with the features including the access to grocery providers and customised search. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password.
By clicking "Install Now", I accept and agree to install the "Shopping Essentials UK" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.  Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/) or contact us at dev@mediastinct.com for any queries.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Shopping Essentials UK", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Shopping Essentials UK", click the Remove button.

Disclaimer:
Shopping Essentials UK is not a part of any of the applications or websites added in this extension including ebay, Amazon UK, M&S, B&Q, Boots, Pets At Home, JD, AO, Curry's PC and John Smith. It is an unofficial app (browser add-on) and independent project and functions only as a new tab extension that has been created to ensure that superstore shopping services can be accessed and used at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
